rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
rows.translation: By the Mount [Sinai],
rows.transliteration: waṭ ṭūr

rows.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
rows.translation: by the Book inscribed
rows.transliteration: wakitābin masṭūr

rows.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
rows.translation: on an unrolled parchment;
rows.transliteration: fī raqqin manshūr

rows.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
rows.translation: by the House greatly frequented;
rows.transliteration: wal baytil ma`mūr

rows.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
rows.translation: by the vault raised high,
rows.transliteration: was saqfil marfū`

rows.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
rows.translation: by the surging sea:
rows.transliteration: wal baḥril masjūr

rows.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
rows.translation: indeed your Lord’s punishment will surely befall.
rows.transliteration: inna `adhāba rabbika lawāqi`

rows.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
rows.translation: There is none who can avert it.
rows.transliteration: mā lahu min dāfi`

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
rows.translation: On the day when the sky whirls violently,
rows.transliteration: yawma tamūrus samā-u mawrā

rows.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
rows.translation: and the mountains move with an awful motion:
rows.transliteration: watasīrul jibālu sayrā

rows.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
rows.translation: woe to the deniers on that day
rows.transliteration: fawaylun yawma-idhin lil-mukadhhibīn

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
rows.translation: —those who play around in vain talk,
rows.transliteration: alladhīna hum fī khawḍiy yal`abūn

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
rows.translation: the day when they will be shoved forcibly toward the fire of hell, [and told:]
rows.transliteration: yawma yuda``ūna ilā nāri jahannama da``ā

rows.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
rows.translation: ‘This is the Fire which you used to deny!
rows.transliteration: hādhihin nārul latī kuntum bihā tukadhhibūn

rows.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
rows.translation: Is this, then, [also] magic, or is it you who do not perceive?
rows.transliteration: afasiḥrun hādhā am antum lā tubṣirūn

rows.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: Enter it, and it will be the same for you whether you are patient or impatient. You are only being requited for what you used to do.’
rows.transliteration: iṣ-lawhā faṣbirū aw lā taṣbirū sawā-un `alaykum ۖ innamā tujzawna mā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
rows.translation: Indeed the Godwary will be amid gardens and bliss,
rows.transliteration: innal muttaqīna fī jannātin wana`īm

rows.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
rows.translation: rejoicing because of what their Lord has given them, and that their Lord has saved them from the punishment of hell.
rows.transliteration: fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum wawaqāhum rabbuhum `adhābal jaḥīm

rows.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: [They will be told:] ‘Enjoy your food and drink, [as a reward] for what you used to do.’
rows.transliteration: kulū washrabū hanī-an bimā kuntum ta`malūn

rows.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
rows.translation: They will be reclining on arrayed couches, and We will wed them to big-eyed houris.
rows.transliteration: muttaki-īna `alā sururin maṣfūfah ۖ wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin `īn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
rows.translation: The faithful and their descendants who followed them in faith—We will make their descendants join them, and We will not stint anything from [the reward of] their deeds. Every person is hostage to what he has earned.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū wattaba`at-hum dhurriyyatuhum bi-iymānin alḥaqnā bihim dhurriyyatahum wa mā alatnāhum min `amalihim min shay-ī ۚ kullum-ri-in bimā kasaba rahīn

rows.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
rows.translation: We will provide them with fruits and meat, such as they desire.
rows.transliteration: wa-amdadnāhum bifākihatin walaḥmin mimmā yashtahūn

rows.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
rows.translation: There they will pass from hand to hand a cup wherein there will be neither any vain talk nor sinful speech.
rows.transliteration: yatanāza`ūna fīhā ka-sal lā laghwun fīhā walā ta-thīm

rows.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
rows.translation: They will be waited upon by their youths, as if they were guarded pearls.
rows.transliteration: wayaṭūfu `alayhim ghil-mānul lahum ka-annahum lu-lu-un maknūn

rows.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
rows.translation: They will turn to one another, questioning each other.
rows.transliteration: wa-aqbala ba`ḍuhum `alā ba`ḍiy yatasā-alūn

rows.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
rows.translation: They will say, ‘Indeed, aforetime, we used to be apprehensive about our families.
rows.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mushfiqīn

rows.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
rows.translation: But Allah showed us favour and He saved us from the punishment of the [infernal] miasma.
rows.transliteration: famannallāhu `alaynā wawaqānā `adhābas samūm

rows.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
rows.translation: We used to supplicate Him aforetime. Indeed He is the All-benign, the All-merciful.’
rows.transliteration: innā kunnā min qablu nad`ūh ۖ innahu huwal barrur raḥīm

rows.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
rows.translation: So admonish. By your Lord’s blessing, you are not a soothsayer, nor mad.
rows.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta bini`mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
rows.translation: Do they say, ‘[He is] a poet, for whom we await a fatal accident’?
rows.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shā`irun natarabbaṣu bihi raybal manūn

rows.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
rows.translation: Say, ‘Wait! I too am waiting along with you.’
rows.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī ma`akum minal mutarabbiṣīn

rows.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
rows.translation: Is it their intellect which prompts them to [say] this, or are they a rebellious lot?
rows.transliteration: am ta-muruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā ۚ am hum qawmun ṭāghūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: Do they say, ‘He has improvised it [himself]?’ Rather, they have no faith!
rows.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalah ۚ bal lā yu-minūn

rows.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: Let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful.
rows.transliteration: falya-tū biḥadīthin mithlihi in kānū ṣādiqīn

rows.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
rows.translation: Were they created from nothing? Or are they [their own] creators?
rows.transliteration: am khuliqū min ghayri shay-in am humul khāliqūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
rows.translation: Did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they have no certainty!
rows.transliteration: am khalaqus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ bal lā yūqinūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
rows.translation: Do they possess the treasuries of your Lord? Or do they control [them]?
rows.transliteration: am `indahum khazā-inu rabbika am humul musayṭirūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Do they have a ladder [leading up to heaven] whereby they eavesdrop? If so, let their eavesdropper produce a manifest authority.
rows.transliteration: am lahum sullamun yastami`ūna fīh ۖ falya-ti mustami`uhum bisulṭānin mubīn

rows.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
rows.translation: Does He have daughters while you have sons?
rows.transliteration: am lahul banātu walakumul banūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
rows.translation: Do you ask them for a reward, so that they are [wary of] being weighed down with debt?
rows.transliteration: am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muthqalūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
rows.translation: Do they have [access to] the Unseen, which they write down?
rows.transliteration: am `indahumul ghaybu fahum yaktubūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
rows.translation: Do they seek to outmaneuver [Allah]? But it is the faithless who are the outmaneuvered ones!
rows.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydā ۖ fal ladhīna kafarū humul makīdūn

rows.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
rows.translation: Do they have any god other than Allah? Clear is Allah of any partners that they may ascribe [to Him]!
rows.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayrullāh ۚ subḥānallāhi `ammā yushrikūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
rows.translation: Were they to see a fragment falling from the sky, they would say, ‘A cumulous cloud.’
rows.transliteration: wa in yaraw kisfan minas samā-i sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūm

rows.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
rows.translation: So leave them until they encounter the day when they will be thunderstruck,
rows.transliteration: fadharhum ḥattā yulāqū yawmahumul ladhī fīhi yuṣ`aqūn

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
rows.translation: the day when their guile will not avail them in any way, nor will they be helped.
rows.transliteration: yawma lā yughnī `anhum kayduhum shay-an walā hum yunṣarūn

rows.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: Indeed there is a punishment besides that for those who do wrong, but most of them do not know.
rows.transliteration: wa inna lilladhīna ẓalamū `adhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
rows.translation: So submit patiently to the judgement of your Lord, for indeed you fare before Our eyes. And celebrate the praise of your Lord when you rise [at dawn],
rows.transliteration: waṣbir liḥukmi rabbika fa-innaka bi-a`yuninā ۖ wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūm

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
rows.translation: and also glorify Him during the night and at the receding of the stars.
rows.transliteration: wa minal layli fasabbiḥ-hu wa idbāran nujūm
